synopsis.text: Ilie and Kidou embark on a perilous journey in a dystopian world ravaged by a mysterious illness known as 'Cagaster'. This affliction, which surfaced at the end of the 21st century, has the horrifying capability of transforming humans into colossal, bloodthirsty insects. As a young exterminator, Kidou has made it his mission to eradicate these monstrous creatures, but when he encounters a dying man in the desert, he is entrusted with the care of the man's daughter, Ilie. Together, they set out to find Ilie's mother, navigating a world where humanity struggles to survive amidst the ever-present threat of the Cagaster-infected. As they venture deeper into this post-apocalyptic landscape, Kidou begins to rediscover his own humanity, realizing that his emotions may not be as buried as he once believed. Join Kidou and Ilie in their thrilling quest for survival and self-discovery in this manga-based series set in 2125, thirty years after the onset of the Cagaster disease.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
